description:
codereview: die if initialized twice

If this happens, something is misconfigured.
If we don't test for this explicitly, MatchAt ends
up calling itself recursively forever.

messages.text:
*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=970f80fb6e72 ***

codereview: die if initialized twice

If this happens, something is misconfigured.
If we don't test for this explicitly, MatchAt ends
up calling itself recursively forever.

R=golang-dev, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5576066

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, r@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

subject: code review 5576066: codereview: die if initialized twice
